```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ex_1 <- expression(x ^ 2)
my_derivative <- deriv(ex_1, "x")
x <- 3
eval(my_derivative)
```

```{r}
ex_2 <- expression(2 * ((3 * a + 2) ^ 4) - 5)
my_deriv_2 <- deriv(ex_2, "a")
a <- 1.2
eval(my_deriv_2)
```
